About US

Theyalow having 13 years of experience in breeding birds, we decided to establish a company for retail and wholesale parrots and goods for their maintenance.Thousands of buyers have purchased feathered friends in our online store. The majority of clients cooperate with us on a regular basis, regularly orders everything necessary for their pets.
